data.title: Hairspray details
data.meta_description: Based on the 1988 John Waters’ cult classic, Hairspray is the story of Tracy Turnblad, a big girl with big hair and an even bigger heart, who has only one passion—dancing.  When her dream of becoming a regular personality on “The Corny Collins Show” comes true, she wins many fans and becomes an advocate for integration. (New Line Cinema)
data.text:
Description: Based on the 1988 John Waters’ cult classic, Hairspray is the story of Tracy Turnblad, a big girl with big hair and an even bigger heart, who has only one passion—dancing. When her dream of becoming a regular personality on “The Corny Collins Show” comes true, she wins many fans and becomes an advocate for integration. (New Line Cinema)

Production Company New Line Cinema, Ingenious Film Partners, Zadan / Meron Productions, Offspring Entertainment, Storyline Entertainment

Release Date Jul 20, 2007

Duration 1 h 57 m

Rating PG

Tagline Who's who behind the do?
